amendment.description: Amendment adds to the Task Force an expert in adolescent and young adult addiction as well as a person in recovery from addiction to medication for chronic pain whose addiction began in adolescence or adulthood. Amendment also directs the Task Force to consider the distinct needs of adolescents and young adults in its development of best practices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 114-551 to add to the Task Force an expert in adolescent and young adult addiction, and a person in recovery from addiction to medication for chronic pain whose addiction began in adolescence or adulthood, and directs the Task Force to consider the distinct needs of adolescents and young adults in its development of best practices.
